Articles.Content: When the loading screen gets to the text "BDArmory/Parts/20mmVulcan/vulcanTurret/bahaGatlingGun" the pic keep scrolling but the loading bar stops. I've let it run for a while and nothing has changed with the bar. What is wrong and how can i fix it?

Are you using AMD?

If the answer is yes, the AMD compatibility mode is disabled.

To enable it go to the Launcher and go to settings and then to advanced and click Run in AMD compatibility mode.

This should fix it.

13 hours ago, Commodoregamer118 said:

Are you using AMD?

If the answer is yes, the AMD compatibility mode is disabled.

To enable it go to the Launcher and go to settings and then to advanced and click Run in AMD compatibility mode.

This should fix it.

I am not using AMD.

Then I need the KSP.log to see the problem and try to fix it.

What are your PC specs?

And, what is your version of KSP?

3 hours ago, Commodoregamer118 said:

Then I need the KSP.log to see the problem and try to fix it.

What are your PC specs?

And, what is your version of KSP?

CPU: Intel I5-4570

GPU: GTX 1650 & Intel 4600

RAM: 16GB

KSP Version: 1.8.1.2964
